name: Eldritch Depths
description:
Made in 72h for LudumDare 48

Due to severe game jam code, the performance in the web version may vary. This was my first time using the 2D system in Unity, which was a lot of fun, had @Dreglord assist with some of the enemy sprites and @YaboiMatoi created the background music.

Final feature list includes 5 enemies, 3 bosses, 5 upgradable stats, 3 abilities and controller support! Hope you enjoy playing it as much as I did making it.
